snippet.title: Naruto Clash of Ninja - Official Trailer
snippet.description: Naruto Clash of Ninja is one of the better fighting games available for the Nintendo Gamecube and Wii.  Its fast paced and accessible combos are the essence of a great fighting game.  With that said, it wasn't hard for The Mediajuice team to capture great scenes from the game and edit them to our original music track to bring this Official Trailer to life.  Study this trrailer and maybe you'll become a real Ninja, like Naruto!
